Domenico Scarlatti

Sonata in G minor, K. 88

? · Fadini 49 · Longo 36 · Pestelli 8

[IMSLP]

Total duration: 7' 30"

  • 1. Grave
  • 2. Andante moderato
  • 3. Allegro
  • 4. Minuet

This sonata was likely written for solo instrument and continuo, but can still be played effectively by keyboard alone. The sonata uses figured bass notation that the performer must realise.

Recommended editions
